description:
Iroha and the other Magical girls finally meet one of the Wings of the Magius, and Iroha asks her many questions. Mifuyu reminds the girls that they are here for a lecture that will reveal the intentions of the Magius.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Doushite Konna ni Mijime Nan Desuka
どうしてこんなにみじめなんですか
